issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Check for Appcelerator updates from studio.
2. You will see update for sdk 3.2.2.GA available.
3. Install the 3.2.2.GA sdk.
4. Go to the sdk location depending on the platform.
5. Open the package.json file & check the version field.

h5.Actual Results:
1. We see version as 3.2.1 & not 3.2.2.

h5.Expected Results:
1. We should see version as 3.2.2.
fields.summary: Package.json shows wrong sdk version 3.2.1 instead of 3.2.2
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appcelerator Studio : 3.2.1.201402061120
Mac OSX 10.8.5
Windows 7, 8, 8.1
Linux 14.04

comments.body: Just updated this in the 3_2_X branch, and added it as a part of the release process.
